alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 3:20PM AKST until January 29 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 13 inches. Visibilities may be significantly reduced at times, especially along roadways. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute on Monday. Powdery, low density snow may significantly reduce visibilities at times, especially along roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow this afternoon will intensify early this evening. The highest rate of snow accumulation will be this evening into the overnight hours. A brief lull in snow is possible late tonight before another heavier band pushes through Monday morning. Highest amounts are expected along the Hillside.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
